item.title: Version 1.1.19
item.description:
What’s New 1. New Landing Page: New mobile News landing page with Industry News and Insight Reports. 2. Login Button: Login added at the bottom of the landing page. 3. Deal Visibility (Admin): Control which deal statuses appear in the mobile app. 4. Image Upload (Admin): Image upload supported for News & Announcements.
Fixes & Enhancements 1. Revenue & Cost now use realized net charges (incl. tax). 2. Last Year's values corrected to full-year net charges. 3. Effective Price and TAP values aligned.

item.title: Version 1.1.18
item.description:
What’s New (v1.1.18+46) • Added Top Deals view for full visibility of deal performance, including rankings, operator breakdowns, and detailed deal modal. • Improved navigation with faster app launch (1–1.5s) and login (3–4s).
Fixes & Enhancements • Updated Previous Year and Current Year calculations for countries and operators using Charge Net. • Growth % now follows updated rules, including proper handling when Previous Year = 0.
